author: Richard Hall, Richard Hall
title: Coronavirus: Vaccine hopes given boost as researcher says virus not mutating
description: Veteran coronavirus research team finds vaccine will likely work for most people
content:
Researchers studying the strain of coronavirus currently wreaking havoc across the world have found that it is not mutating at a level that would make it significantly more deadly. 
The findings by a veteran coronavirus research team have raised hopes that w… [+5299 chars]
